rules_text:
Mirrorgate enters tapped.
When Mirrorgate enters, you choose a nonbasic land card name other than Mirrorgate, then each player chooses a color.
Lands with the chosen name are lands with “{T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors,” and lose all other abilities, card types, and land types.
{T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors.
notes:
fluffy: of>with, +card (does this work? don't they just become Mirrorgates which makes the ability not apply which makes it apply again and et cetera)

Mirrorgate enters the battlefield tapped.
When Mirrorgate enters the battlefield, if it isn't a copy, choose a nonbasic land card name other than Mirrorgate.
Lands with the chosen name are copies of Mirrorgate.
T: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
